import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import { Descriptions, Divider, Breadcrumb, Button, Input, message, InputNumber, Table, Tag, Select, Dropdown, Space } from 'antd'; import { DownOutlined, UserOutlined, SearchOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import './index.css' const { Option } = Select; export default class Cim extends Component { CimSearch = () => { console.log(this.idInput.value) console.log(this.nameInput.state.value) console.log(this.categoryInput.state.value) console.log(this.statusSelect) const [ID,commodity,category,status] = [ this.idInput.value, this.nameInput.state.value, this.categoryInput.state.value, (undefined == this.statusSelect.value)?this.statusSelect.props.defaultValue:this.statusSelect.value ] console.log(ID,) } selectChange = (e) => { console.log(e) this.statusSelect.value = e } render() { return (
主页 商品信息管理 仓库商品信息展示，可以进行新增商品，商品入库，商品出库操作
id: { this.idInput = elev }} />
商品名称: { this.nameInput = elev }} />
分类: { this.categoryInput = elev }} />
商品状态:
Cim
) } }
